title: test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_metadata failes on crippledfs

labels.name: crippled-filesystems
labels.description: Issue concerned with operation on crippled filesystems, regardless of OS

body:
Happened with gh-4708 running on an exFAT SSD.

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_metadata
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 1875, in test_AnnexRepo_metadata
    'd o w n.dat': 'lowcontent'
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/utils.py", line 2369, in create_tree
    remove_existing=remove_existing)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/utils.py", line 2345, in create_tree
    os.makedirs(path)
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/os.py", line 221, in makedirs
    mkdir(name, mode)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_test_AnnexRepo_metadatam6v1tkmc/d o"w n'
```
